forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 2am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the evening air is tempered by a delicate coolness, a hallmark of this coastal city wrapped in a gentle embrace of marine influence. The sky reveals itself as a tapestry of muted clouds, and while the sun has cast its glow through the day, that warmth now gives way to the familiar twist of fog that may tease its way in after midnight. A whisper of wind meanders through the streets, hinting at the crispness to come. As the shadows elongate, prepare for a night where warmth will find refuge in layers—a light jacket or a cozy sweater will serve well against the encroaching chill.

As the night unfolds, the drizzle becomes a possible companion after the hour of two, a soft reminder that the essence of downtown life is not only to be lived in sunlight but also in the rhythm of raindrops drawing patterns on sidewalks. With this autumn-like quality descending upon the evening, now is the perfect time to indulge in a leisurely stroll through the streets, perhaps seeking out the warm glow of a café. Embrace the charm of a hot beverage, allowing the simple warmth to counterbalance the cool touch of the evening air, as the city's heartbeat continues unperturbed—even as the fog swirls and dances just beyond the reach of what the eye can see.
